## Description {#details}

A chain of instructions that form a partial reduction.

Designed to match: reduction&#95;bin&#95;op (bin&#95;op (extend (A), (extend (B))), accumulator).

Definition at line 30 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vprecipebuilder-h">VPRecipeBuilder.h</a>.
